imdb.plot outline: Sammy & Co is the TV series sequel of the two full length animated features "A Turtle's Tale: Sammy's Adventures" and "A Turtle's Tale 2: Sammy's Escape from Paradise". The heroes of this animated series are Ricky and Ella, two young turtles who live in a Paradisaic Atoll. Together they have a lot of incredible adventures!
imdb.title: Sammy & Co
plot: _Sammy & Co_ (qv) is the TV series sequel of the two full length animated features "A Turtle's Tale: Sammy's Adventures" and "A Turtle's Tale 2: Sammy's Escape from Paradise". The heroes of this animated series are Ricky and Ella, two young turtles who live in a Paradisaic Atoll. Together they have a lot of incredible adventures!
